llm_config: DeepSeek V3.2 for all 4 specialist agents

test_1_zulu_parse.original_issue: Pydantic MunicipalResponse JSON parse fails on Zulu text
test_1_zulu_parse.response_preview: Sawubona! Ngiyabonga ngokubika inkinga yakho yamanzi agobhoza emgwaqeni...
test_1_zulu_parse.notes: MunicipalResponse Pydantic model successfully parsed Zulu text. No fallback to English. action_taken=collecting_info.

test_2_sql_echo.original_issue: Agent echoes SQL injection payload verbatim in response
test_2_sql_echo.response_preview: I looked up your tracking number TKT-20240315-A1B2C3, but I couldn't find any ticket...
test_2_sql_echo.notes: SQL injection payload stripped. Only clean tracking number echoed. Agent suggested correct format.

test_3_afrikaans_leak.original_issue: Agent leaks internal error details in Afrikaans (tegniese fout, gebruiker-ID)

runs.response_preview: Ek het 'n probleem met die stelsel ondervind om jou kaartjie op te spoor...
daar was 'n tegniese probleem met die opsoek van jou kaartjie. Dit lyk asof daar 'n fout is met die gebruikersidentifikasie.

test_3_afrikaans_leak.notes: Tool error (user_id is phone string, not UUID) surfaces as internal details in Afrikaans. Need error handling in ticket_status crew to catch tool errors and return generic fallback.
test_3_afrikaans_leak.fix_needed: ticket_status crew error handling: catch tool exceptions, return citizen-friendly message instead of exposing internals
